titleInfo.title: Spontaneous lymphocyte proliferation is elevated in asymptomatic HTLV-I-positive Jamaicans

bibliographicCitation.ama: Krämer A, Jacobson S, Reuben JS, et al. Spontaneous lymphocyte proliferation is elevated in asymptomatic HTLV-I-positive Jamaicans. In: Blattner WA, ed. Human retrovirology: HTLV. New York: Raven Pr.; 1990: 79-85.
